Package engtelecom.poo

Class Segmento

java.lang.Object
engtelecom.poo.Segmento
public class Segmento extends Object
The type Segmento, a segment of the digit. Receive the initial x and y coordinates. Receive the size of the draw. Receive the color of the segments when it's on or off.
Author:
Theodor Konrad Wojcikiewicz
